name: Full Test Suite
executingTests: Should launch the app successfully
Should navigate to login screen from welcome
Should handle app backgrounding and foregrounding
Should login successfully with user having bank account @ios @android @auth @smoke
Should login successfully with user without bank account
Should show error for invalid OTP
Should require phone number for login
Should register a new user successfully
Should register a new user and link bank account successfully
Should display all navigation tabs in the app
Should display net worth card
Should add a manual account successfully
Should edit a manual account
Should link a bank account
Should delete an account and remove its transactions
Should deactivate an account but retain transactions
Should re-link same accounts after deleting all bank accounts
Should display all 15 supported currencies
Should cancel currency change correctly
Should change currency and persist after logout/login
Should display all profile fields
Should successfully change nickname
Should allow canceling nickname changes
Should successfully change gender selection
Should allow canceling gender selection changes
Should test all gender options selection
